name: S.U.C.E.S
description:
Do you have what it take to fight with the best at S.U.C.E.S? If you think your up for the challenge, you better put your big boy pants on cause this is gonna be on hell of a ride! Your gonna be fighting your way through hordes of aliens, and collect the organs of their fallen. Then you will be able to trade those organs in for some nice rewards from Pete. So lets see what you go and join S.U.C.E.S today!

(S.U.C.E.S Tip: Your blood has been infused with special chemicals that can dissolve the barriers inside of alien hideouts, so shooting them a couple of times should do the trick.)
